WorkItem.Description:
As reported on Twitter:

During the Excel conversion phase, using the example provided:

```
.\Convert-SqlServerInventoryClixmlToExcel.ps1 -FromPath "C:\Inventory\SQL Server Inventory.xml.gz"
```

I received a divide-by-zero error in line 2908 of SqlServerInventory.psm1, for the value $LogicalDisk.SizeBytes.

In the collection phase, I used the Example 4 values in the README document:

```
.\Get-SqlServerInventoryToClixml.ps1 -Computername $env:COMPUTERNAME -IncludeDatabaseObjectInformation -LoggingPreference Verbose
```

I'm running two instances on this machine: SQL Server 2012 and 2014 CTP 2.

I have kept the capture file. It's 15MB so just let me know which section you need.
WorkItem.Summary: Divide by zero error in Excel conversion
